" — " + excerpt : "") + (imageUrl ? " — Image: " + imageUrl : "") + (tags.length ? " — Tags: " + tags.join(", ") : ""); Todoist.createTask.setTaskContent(content).setProjectId($$Project_id$$.trim()).setPriority("Medium"); } else { Todoist.createTask.skip("Missing title or URL"); }
intent:
When a new item is saved to Pocket, check if it meets certain conditions and then add the item as a task in Todoist.

The filter code should extract the title, URL, excerpt, image URL, tags, and added at date/time from the Pocket item. It will then create a new task in Todoist with specific details based on these extracted values.

filter_code: var tempF = Weather.currentTemperatureDropsBelow.TempFahrenheit; var threshold = parseInt(Das.keyboardQ.trigger_temperature, 10); var isF = (Das.keyboardQ.trigger_degrees_type === 'fahrenheit'); if (!isF) { Daskeyboardq.signals.skip('Degrees type not Fahrenheit'); } else if (typeof tempF !== 'number' || isNaN(threshold)) { Daskeyboardq.signals.skip('Invalid temperature data'); } else if (tempF >= threshold) { Daskeyboardq.signals.skip('Temperature not below threshold'); } else { var message = 'Temperature dropped to ' + tempF + '°F'; Daskeyboardq.signals.setName(message); Daskeyboardq.signals.setZone(Das.keyboardQ.trigger_zone); if (Das.keyboardQ.trigger_color) { Daskeyboardq.signals.setColor(Das.keyboardQ.trigger_color); } if (Das.keyboardQ.trigger_effect) { Daskeyboardq.signals.setEffect(Das.keyboardQ.trigger_effect); } Daskeyboardq.signals.runAction && Daskeyboardq.signals.runAction(); }
intent: Send a Signal to Das Keyboard Q when the temperature drops below the specified value.
